cleaned_text: Item # bci2019040 The ThermaSol NTST-PC has been discontinued ** See similar or replacement items below ** ThermaSol Traditional Retractable Aromatherapy Steam Head Model: NTST-PC from the [No Touch Collection](/collection/ThermaSol/No%20Touch) Discontinued Product Overview NTST Features: - Constructed from solid brass - Covered under ThermaSol's 5 year warranty - Built in aromatherapy reservoir - Steam outlet is operated by thermal exposure meaning no touching of the steam head is required - Features a traditional design with rounded edges NTST Specifications: - Overall Diameter: 3-1/2" Additional ThermaSol Links This product is listed under the following manufacturer number(s): [ThermaSol NTST-AB](/thermasol-ntst-antique-brass-traditional-retractable-aromatherapy-steam-head/f2019040)* Antique Brass *Denotes a finish or option that has been discontinued. Manufacturer Resources Dimensions and Measurements Diameter 3.5 in. Warranty and Product Information Made in America Yes Manufacturer Warranty 5 Year
